SQL.LOAD: SELECT claim_status_by_group_id, default_type_id, method_of_repair_id, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, default_claim_status_id, company_group_id FROM elp_default_claim_status WHERE default_claim_status_id = :default_claim_status_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: select DCS.default_claim_status_id, default_types.list_item_id as default_type_id, default_types.default_type, Claim_Statuses.claim_status_by_group_id, Claim_Statuses.claim_status_by_group, method_of_repairs.list_item_id as method_of_repair_id, method_of_repairs.method_of_repair as method_of_repair FROM elp_default_claim_status DCS, (Select claim_status_by_group_id, tran1.translation as claim_status_by_group from elp_claim_status_by_group CSBG join elp_list_item item1 on item1.list_item_id = CSBG.list_item_id join elp_dict_item_translation tran1 on tran1.dict_item_id = item1.dict_item_id and tran1.language_id = :language_id1 where CSBG.company_group_id = :company_group_id) Claim_Statuses, -- (select li2.list_item_id, dit2.translation as default_type from elita.elp_list l2, elp_list_item li2, elp_dict_item_translation dit2 where l2.list_id = li2.list_id and li2.dict_item_id = dit2.dict_item_id and l2.code = 'ECSDT' and dit2.language_id = :language_id2) default_types, -- (select li3.list_item_id, dit3.translation as method_of_repair from elita.elp_list l3, elp_list_item li3, elp_dict_item_translation dit3 where l3.list_id = li3.list_id and li3.dict_item_id = dit3.dict_item_id and l3.code = 'METHR' and dit3.language_id = :language_id3) method_of_repairs Where DCS.claim_status_by_group_id = claim_statuses.claim_status_by_group_id and DCS.default_type_id = default_types.list_item_id and DCS.method_of_repair_id = method_of_repairs.list_item_id (+) order by default_type
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_default_claim_status SET claim_status_by_group_id = :claim_status_by_group_id, default_type_id = :default_type_id, method_of_repair_id = :method_of_repair_id, company_group_id = :company_group_id, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE default_claim_status_id = :default_claim_status_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_default_claim_status ( claim_status_by_group_id, default_type_id, method_of_repair_id, created_by, default_claim_status_id, company_group_id ) VALUES ( :claim_status_by_group_id, :default_type_id, :method_of_repair_id, :created_by, :default_claim_status_id, :company_group_id )
